data.title: Tears flow as fans salute retiring Nadal after Davis Cup defeat
data.description: MALAGA, Spain: Rafael Nadal said farewell to tennis and his fans saluted their retiring hero in a bittersweet and emotional ceremony at a sold-out Malaga arena following his last professional match in Spain’s 2-1 Davis Cup defeat to the Netherlands on Tuesday.
